title: ZBTP Identity
description: A pseudonymous identity anchored by an Ed25519 public key. Identities are JSON objects that may be signed by the key they advertise.

alias.description: Optional human-friendly name for this identity (not authoritative).

hash.description: SHA-256 hex of the canonical serialized identity object (excluding the 'hash' field).

signature.description: Signature may be an object (detached) or a hex string in examples.
